=Data Inputs=

Cases:
 # Required input, any value is ok (e.g. Get2DImagesByPOI srsName is resolved through call to Central)
 # Required input, one of several allowed values (e.g. filter=maptype:coronal or filter=maptype:sagittal)
 # Optional input, any value, with a default value (e.g. srsName defaults to Mouse_AGEA_1.0 if no value provided)
 # Optional input, one of several allowed values, with a default value (e.g. filter=maptype:coronal, filter=maptype:sagittal, defaults to maptype:coronal if not specified)
 # ? Optional input, any value, no default (I don't think this case makes any sense to me)

==Case 1 -- Required Input, Any Value is Accepted==

!ProcessDefinition File (Deegree .../processes/Xxx.xml):
{{{
<LiteralInput>
  <Identifier>srsName</Identifier>
  <Title>Atlas SRS Name</Title>
  <Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</Abstract>
</LiteralInput>
}}}

WPS !DescribeProcess response:
{{{
<Input minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
  <ows:Identifier>srsName</ows:Identifier>
  <ows:Title>Atlas SRS Name</ows:Title>
  <ows:Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</ows:Abstract>
  <LiteralData>
    <ows:AnyValue/>
  </LiteralData>
</Input>
}}}

The INCF Atlas implementation will accept:
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=Mouse_AGEA_1.0;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=abcde;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=;...

==Case 2 -- Required Input, One of Several Allowed Values==

!ProcessDefinition File (Deegree .../processes/Xxx.xml):
{{{
<LiteralInput>
  <Identifier>filter</Identifier>
  <Title>Filter</Title>
  <Abstract></Abstract>
  <AllowedValues>
    <Value>maptype:coronal</Value>
    <Value>maptype:sagittal</Value>
  </AllowedValues>
</LiteralInput>
}}}

WPS !DescribeProcess response:
{{{
<Input minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
  <ows:Identifier>filter</ows:Identifier>
  <ows:Title>Filter</ows:Title>
  <ows:Abstract/>
  <LiteralData>
    <ows:AllowedValues>
      <ows:Value>maptype:coronal</ows:Value>
      <ows:Value>maptype:sagittal</ows:Value>
    </ows:AllowedValues>
  </LiteralData>
</Input>
}}}

The INCF Atlas implementation will accept:
 * http://....&DataInputs=...filter=maptype:coronal;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=...filter=maptype:sagittal;...

==Case 3 -- Optional Input, Any Value is Accepted, With a Default Value==
 * If the data input is omitted, the default value is used

!ProcessDefinition File (Deegree .../processes/Xxx.xml):
{{{
<LiteralInput>
  <Identifier>srsName</Identifier>
  <Title>Atlas SRS Name</Title>
  <Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</Abstract>
  <DefaultValue>Mouse_AGEA_1.0</DefaultValue>
</LiteralInput>
}}}

WPS !DescribeProcess response:
{{{
<Input minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
  <ows:Identifier>srsName</ows:Identifier>
  <ows:Title>Atlas SRS Name</ows:Title>
  <ows:Abstract>The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.</ows:Abstract>
  <LiteralData>
    <ows:AnyValue/>
    <DefaultValue>Mouse_AGEA_1.0</DefaultValue>
  </LiteralData>
</Input>
}}}

The INCF Atlas implementation will accept:
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=Mouse_AGEA_1.0;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=abcde;... (i.e. any value)
 * http://....&DataInputs=...srsName=;... (including empty string)
 * http://....&DataInputs=......
   * Data input srsName omitted, defaults to Mouse_AGEA_1.0

==Case 4 -- Optional Input, One of Several Allowed Values, With a Default Value==
 * If the data input is omitted, the default value is used

!ProcessDefinition File (Deegree .../processes/Xxx.xml):
{{{
<LiteralInput>
  <Identifier>filter</Identifier>
  <Title>Filter</Title>
  <Abstract></Abstract>
  <DefaultValue>maptype:coronal</DefaultValue>
  <AllowedValues>
    <Value>maptype:coronal</Value>
    <Value>maptype:sagittal</Value>
  </AllowedValues>
</LiteralInput>
}}}

WPS !DescribeProcess response:
{{{
<Input minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
  <ows:Identifier>filter</ows:Identifier>
  <ows:Title>Filter</ows:Title>
  <ows:Abstract/>
  <LiteralData>
    <ows:AllowedValues>
      <ows:Value>maptype:coronal</ows:Value>
      <ows:Value>maptype:sagittal</ows:Value>
    </ows:AllowedValues>
    <DefaultValue>maptype:coronal</DefaultValue>
  </LiteralData>
</Input>
}}}


The INCF Atlas implementation will accept:
 * http://....&DataInputs=...filter=maptype:coronal;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=...filter=maptype:sagittal;...
 * http://....&DataInputs=......
   * Data input filter omitted, defaults to maptype:coronal
